properties.name: Vol. 1. Plate, G. [Map bounded by Madison St., Broadway, Decatur St., Ralph Ave.; Including Putman St., Jefferson St., Hancock St., Halsey St., Macon St., Mc Donough St., Howard Ave., Saratoga Ave., Hopkinson Ave.]
